name: Wonder Pets! Save the Animals!
description:
Animals are in trouble everywhere - a baby panda in China, a Bengal tiger in India, and a chimpanzee in outer space! Linny, Ming-Ming and Tuck need your help to bring everyone home safely.

Features

• Dress the Wonder Pets in different costumes!
• Build the Flyboat using the stylus
• Interactive Activities Include: Tapping, Blowing, Speaking and Dragging
